About Me Work

Work

  • UX/UI Design, Design Direction & Front-end Dev

    Stackla Admin Portal

    The Stackla Admin Portal allows clients to aggregate and curate their content, and edit their displays. The UX has been constantly improved with user testing, and is supported by a minimal design focusing on content and small bursts of colour.

    Visit Site

  • Web Design & Front-end Dev

    True Skate

    True Skate is the #1 game on the app store in 70 countries. We used Stackla to create a microsite that would promote the brand's social media, engage users to post their own content, and drive sales.

    Visit Site

  • Front-end Dev

    Manchester United

    The site allows fans to see all the content being produced by the club in one place across all their major accounts. It's a national site, serving multiple languages at once.

    Visit Site

  • Front-end Dev

    Asia's Next Top Model

    Built to support the TV show and promote social engagement after each week's program. A custom Wordpress theme built from scratch to suit the client's designs.

    Visit Site

  • Web Design & Front-end Dev

    Myer

    A number of widgets were built to support the livestream of the Myer Spring Summer 2015 Fashion Launch.
